arm_group.description: Treatment with Thermage CPT Framed Tip
Treatment with the Thermage CPT Pattern Tip
Treatment with the Thermage CPT Pattern tip

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study to evaluate treatment with the Thermage CPT system for facial and
      neck laxity.

clinical_study.brief_title: Thermage CPT for Treatment of Facial and Neck Laxity

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  25 - 65 years of age

          -  Moderate facial and neck laxity

          -  Subject has the ability to follow the study instructions, is willing to be available
             on the specific required study visit days, and is willing to complete all study visit
             procedures and assessments.

          -  Subject must understand the research nature of this study and sign an Institutional
             Review Board (IRB)-approved informed consent prior to the performance of any study
             specific procedure or assessment.

          -  Subject agrees not to undergo excluded procedures on the face and neck for the
             duration of study.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Subject is pregnant or breast feeding, or trying to become pregnant for three months
             prior to or during the study.

          -  Pacemaker, internal defibrillator, or other implanted electronic device

          -  Subject has an active localized infection in the treatment area(s) or an uncontrolled
             systemic infection.

          -  Subject has had prior cosmetic procedures on the treatment area(s) within six months
             of the baseline visit.

intervention.description: Treatment with Thermage pattern or framed tip

clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Comparison of the Thermage CPT™ System's Framed and Pattern Tips for Treatment of Facial and Neck Laxity

primary_outcome.description: Improvement in facial and neck laxity 6 months following treatment.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
